contexts.context: ...my private world,I discovered that,though this was a <mark>game</mark>,or rather precisely because it was a game -...
...a game,or rather precisely because it was a <mark>game</mark> - that is to say,not a necessity like eating...
...A secondary world,be it a poem, or a <mark>game</mark> of football or bridge,must be as much a...
...,the only difference being that in the world of <mark>games</mark> one is free to decide what its laws shall...
...decide what its laws shall be. But to all <mark>games</mark> as to real life,Goethe's lines apply....
